Messages.noFeaturesFound: No facilities found in the buffer area.
Messages.routeCouldNotBeCalculated: Route could not be calculated from current location.
Messages.tinyURLEngine: Bitly API engine is not working; please try again after some time.
Messages.geoLocation: You are currently outside the supported area.
Messages.geolocationTimeout: The browser is unable to supply a position at this time.
Messages.geolocationPermissionDenied: Please enable permissions for current location.
Messages.numberOfFeaturesFoundNearCounty: Found ${0} facility(ies) in the Searched county
Messages.numberOfFeaturesFoundBySearch: Found ${0} facility(ies) matching the searched criteria
Messages.commentsErrorMessage: Unable to add comments. Comments table is either absent or does not have write access.
Messages.falseConfigParams: Required configuration key values are either null or not exactly matching with layer attributes. This message may appear multiple times.
Messages.referenceOverlayError: Unable to load reference overlay layer.
Messages.missingFacilityLayerURL: Please add facility layer URL in config file.
Messages.blankInfoPopupFields: Info-Popup fields are blank. Please configure Info-Popup fields.
Messages.noBaseMapURL: Basemap URLs are not configured. Please configure base map URLs.
Messages.serviceError: Service is taking too long to respond. Please contact Website Admin.
